cont.entity_a: With steel casters and rubber wheels.
Generally straightforward but some parts were damaged or missing. Clear assembly instructions, but parts are not labeled, making it difficult to identify.
cont.entity_b: Easy to assemble with pre-drilled holes aligning well.

cont.entity_a: Some reports of damage upon arrival, including cracks and dents.
Very sturdy and provides extra work surface in small kitchens.
cont.entity_b: Stable once assembled, though some users reported it being rickety.

Wheels.comm: Lockable wheels make it easy to move and secure.

cont.entity_b: Some issues with wheels not fitting properly and cracking. Wheels are considered low quality.

cont.entity_a: Cabinet and drawer provide adequate storage space.
cont.entity_b: Offers ample storage space with shelves and a pull-out cutting board.

cont.entity_a: Drop leaves are sturdy and add significant workspace.
cont.entity_b: Highly functional with a slide-out cutting board and towel rack.

Customer Service.comm: Customer service is responsive in handling replacement parts.

cont.entity_b: Customer service is efficient in replacing damaged parts.

cont.entity_a: Affordable price for the quality and functionality offered.
Some assembly issues due to unlabeled parts and soft metal screws.
cont.entity_b: Knife holder is optional and can be removed.
